name: Forest Jam
description:
Don’t miss out on the latest fruity mobile game!

Swap juicy fruits to make matches of three or more. Use special combo fruits to blast through hundreds of levels in Forest Jam. Help Abbie make delicious jam and join on this amazingly fruity journey through Forest Jam.

Forest Jam Features:
- Over 200 different adventurous & innovative levels
- Tasty fruits with well-designed boosters
- Small size app packed with excellent graphics
- Completely FREE to play
- Enjoy multiple challenging modes (Limited Moves, Time Limited and Drop Down mode)

Download Forest Jam now! Have fun with this interesting and addictive match-3 game.
